inn1.comm: whipped to the square leg boundary to start, what a start that is. Jongwe strays on Zadran's pads and he flicks that with exemplary timing to the boundary, setting the tone for the innings
fuller than a good length outside off, NAZ stays back and pats it towards cover. May have kept a touch low

streaky runs, good length delivery but some swing back into the right-hander who looks to drive on the up, a thick inside edge evades the stumps and almost makes it to the fine leg boundary but for a diving save
good length outside off, chopped to point
fullish length, nice full delivery inviting some swing. Not much on offer though and NAZ drives to mid-off
short and wide, too wide in fact and a wide is called
crisply punched, good length outside off, some inward movement but Zadran pushes it off the front foot to cover
short and wide, not a great delivery to start. Shahzad looks to paste it to the cover boundary but the timing goes all awry, can only drive to cover
full and straight on middle, turned off his pads towards short midwicket. Tucked for room
back of a length outside off, fourth-stump line, defended off the back foot
good length on off, nice lengths. Shahzad defends solidly
well bowled, full outside off, a hint of away movement. A thick outside edge rolls to third man
back of a length on middle, nudged off his hips towards fine leg to keep strike
fullishl, tailing back in. Definite inward movement. Driven to mid-on
short outside off, just a tad short. NAZ goes after the pull and smashes the pull over midwicket for four
full on off, shaping back in. Defended from the crease
full, a half-volley outside off, driven with the angle to mid-on
wonderful shot, good fielding as well. Full outside off, NAZ leans into his drive and just times it past cover, mid-off makes a good diving stop
back of a length on off, Zadran goes back to push to cover.
too wide and that races to the point boundary, what timing. Zadran cuts powerfully past point but the ball squealed across for four.
a mere flick, the timing is terrific yet again and that will be four more. Full on middle and leg, not a great delivery but Zadran just turned it off his pads with an uppish tuck over square leg
good change-up, full outside off, driven to cover
not quite a half-volley but very full, drilled to cover with a good front foot stride

the best of the lot! Looking particularly good here is Noor Ali Zadran. Full on middle, Zadran waits for the ball to come to him before on-driving with a high elbow, right under his eyes. The timing takes it to the boundary
just clears mid-off. Tossed up off the first delivery, Shahzad clears one foot and whacks the full delivery over mid-off. The fielder was interested for a while, but the ball evaded him

Shahzad goes! Exuberant stroke and he pays for it with his dismissal. Nothing delivery, full on middle with a  bit of air, Shahzad was not happy with just one boundary, he skipped down the track and heaved it away but straight down the throat of the deep midwicket fielder, picked him out to perfection.
tossed up but on leg, worked to deep midwicket
flatter on middle, not much turn. Nabi blocks
slider on leg, wider off the crease, drifts on and hits Nabi's pads but skidding down leg
tossed up on off, Nabi looks for a drive but the ball squirts off the inside edge to short fine leg
fullish outside off, not much swing. NAZ comes forward to play back to the bowler
poor delivery, good length on leg, NAZ comes down and flicks off his hips towards the fine leg boundary, hauled in just in time
cracked away, wonderful timing. Full outside off and a drive was there to be played but Zadran failed to find the gap. Picked out extra cover
fullish on off, nice length. Pushed to cover
good length outside off, steered towards point. A good length that to bowl on this pitch
good batting, fullish outside off, dabbed to third man with the open bat face
flight on middle, worked to short midwicket for a quick run
fuller length, quick through the air, blocked off the front foot
full on middle, Nabi comes down and inside-halves to midwicket
flat on middle, hardly any turn. Driven with the angle to long-on for one
tossed up on leg, nudged to short midwicket
full on leg, skidding on yet again, pushed to midwicket
good length outside off, no swing for Muzarabani, guided down to third man
fuller length outside off, Nabi remains watchful and tamely pushes to cover
beautiful timing this time, full on middle and Nabi flicked it with a lot of power and timing over the vacant midwicket region
fullish outside off, Nabi drills a drive to mid-off, waited for that nicely
short and wide, too wide but Nabi half-heartedly looks to dab to third man but misses completely
a nice steer to third man from Nabi and he'll keep strike
slower outside off, good pace. Punched to extra cover off the back foot
good shot. Tossed up and Nabi comes down to the pitch and just pummels an uppish drive over mid-off. Wonderful timing
flat on off, dragged his length back there, defended
overpitched delivery on off, pushed to long-on with the angle
slower through the air, extracting a bit of turn too, played out to point
flat on off, quick through the air, guided to third man
what a shot that is. beautiful from Nabi. Did not look to overhit it, all timing there. Full on off, Nabi just picks it up and whips the ball over the midwicket boundary for six!  Super stroke there

short and wide, and taken! Against the run of play. Stunning catch from the third man fielder. Not a delivery you want to be getting out to, but Nabi played under the ball a touch and the ball bounced and took a thick outside edge which flew all the way to third man who dived and hung on to a sharp chance. Well done from Jongwe.
good length outside off, driven off the back foot to cover
sensational batting, very good stroke. Fullihs outside off, NAZ leans on a drive and offers the full face, high elbow and drives powerfully past the bowler for four.
back of a length outside off, NAZ opens the face and steers to third man
full outside off, left alone comfortably
flatter on leg, NAZ goes back to punch back
slower on middle and leg, nice flight. Played out towards midwicket
flight on middle and leg, clipped to long-on
slower through the air, some miscommunication but they make it through easily. Worked against the spin towards square leg for one
tossed up on leg, nudged powerfully to square leg
very quick and flat on off, crunched to point off the back foot
flat down leg, played out to short fine leg for a quick run
tossed up nicely on middle, Zadran dances down the track but pushes to cover
flat on leg, driven off the back foot with a high elbow and with the spin to long-on
tossed up on off, blocked
very flat and quick again on off, drilled to long-on
tossed up on middle, pushed towards long-off who concedes the second after a fumble
nice flight outside off but a tad full, driven to long-off
loss in concentration, tossed up on middle, Zadran goes down to try and loft over the bowler but skews in the air towards deep cover, lands a few feet in front
beauty, tossed up outside off. the ball grips in the wicket and turns, beats the outside edge

gone! Another wild hoick and another wicket. Nice flight on middle, Mangal goes for a swipe over midwicket and against the turn, the ball turns a touch and takes the top edge which lobs up and straight to cover who takes an easy catch.
nice flight yet again, good length too, drawing Zadran forward who gets a thick outside edge on the bounce to slip who misfields and allows the single
flight on middle, nice pace. Worked to deep midwicket
very slow on leg, tickled fine to short fine leg
flat on middle, keeps a tad low. Zadran goes back and pushes back
tossed up on middle now, good changes in pace here. Clipped to square leg
slower ball on leg, lobs up off the thigh pad towards square leg
tossed upon off, nudged with the spin to midwicket
shortish on off, Zadran goes deep in the crease to defend back
good run, pushes with soft hands towards mid-on and sets off for a quick single and makes it easy
flatter on leg, skiddy stuff. Slides on and hits AS on the pads but drifting down leg
googly! Well bowled, lands it nicely outside off, a thick inside edge onto pad
tossed up on middle, defended
flat down leg, takes a bit of pad and then to the keeper
driven back at the bowler
shortish on middle and leg, pulled to short fine leg.
slower on off, Zadran comes down and pushes the ball back to the bowler
cut towards backward point who makes a good diving stop, lots of miscommunication again but they go through with the run.
slowed up on off, pushed back
flatter down leg, Zadran goes deep in the crease but mistimes his pull to short fine leg
lots of flight again on off, driven to mid-on
short and flat on middle, Zadran goes back and clips to deep midwicket.
tossed up on leg, worked to fine leg where there is no run
slowed up nicely on off, worked to deep square leg
floated up on leg, tickled towards short fine leg for a quick run
very slow and short on off, plenty of time for Zadran to go back and clip to long-on
fired in on leg, pushed to midwicket
very slow on leg, Stanikzai misses his flick but is struck on the pads, sliding down
slogged! A hoick goes to square leg, tossed up and looked to belt it down the ground
back of a length outside off to start, quelled to midwicket
and again!  Good length outside off, shaping back in, pushed towards midwicket
too short this time, not a good delivery at all. Zadran gets on his toes and pulls powerfully past short fine leg to get to his fifty, great innings this
fullish outside off, slices a drive powerfully to the sweeper cover
back of a length on off, not much seam movement, Stanikzai blocks
full and straight, pushed to midwicket and some miscommunication yet again, but all good in the end
slower on middle and leg, Zadran goes to down the ground but the ball spins in and hits him on the thigh pad
shortish outside off, played with soft hands towards third man
very slow down leg, pings off the pads towards fine leg for a couple
too flat, darted in down leg, turned to square leg
nicely bowled, tossed up on off, driven to cover
floated up on off, worked towards square leg for a quick run, the keeper scampers across but cannot collect cleanly
good length outside off, played to cover
fuller length on off, squeezed to point
that is better, good length delivery outside off, jabbed to extra cover for a run
ugly! Wild slog, good length outside off, Zadran looks to heave over midwicket but fails to connect
wideish outside off, sliced to third man, opened the bat-face nicely on that occasion
slapped to the sweeper cover for another run. too short and wide from Chamu
very flat down leg, darted in. Clipped but straight to square leg
flat outside off, no turn. Punched back at Raza
another ungly swipe. Slower on off, AS comes down the track but can only squeeze his sweep to deep midwicket
tossed up outside off, Zadran gets down early to slog sweep but misses, rolls towards third man off his body
much better, runs down and punches a drive to long-off
turn there, well bowled, pitched on middle and spins towards leg, beats Mangal on the inside edge
full delivery on leg, missed opportunity for some runs. Whipped but straight to fine leg
beaten outside the off stump. Full outside off, moves away just a little, Zadran too plays inside the line and the ball swerves past the outside edge
back of a length outside off, squirted to midwicket
shortish and wide, chopped towards the sweeper cover
full on off, driven powerfully but to mid-off
short and wide, slapped to the sweeper fielder. Just two of the over
flat down leg, clipped to short fine leg for a run
fired in again on those pads, worked into the leg side
great shot. Skips down the track, gets to the pitch and swings it over midwicket for four, very well played
flatter on leg, tickled to square leg
darted in on that leg stump, Zadran finds square leg again
big appeal from Raza but not given, Zadran oes down early to sweep but gets some bat on it towards square leg
fullish length outside off, Zadran swivels a flick to deep square leg
another bad shot. runs at the bowler and looks to heave it away but can only mis-time to midwicket, not great batting this.

direct hit and that looks out. Amazing fielding from Raza. Shortish delivery outside off, chopped away towards cover. After some hesitation, Stanikzai decides to go for the run, Raza picks up cleanly and turns around, fires an accurate throw to the strikers end to find Stanikzai well short. Exceptional fielding.

gone! Big wicket, the set man has to go. Just a full delivery outside off, Zadran looks to steer to third man but the ball skids on and takes a feather through to the keeper. Zadran looked really good in his innings but has to go now.
shortish outside off, chopped to cover
fullish outside off, guided to point from the crease with minimal feet movement.
slowish on leg, hits Shenwari on the pad and then the ball rolls towards short fine leg who swoops down on it and fires a throw to the non-strikers end, would have been close with a direct hit
tossed up on middle, defended
drifts down leg, tickled fine to short fine leg who does well
pushed to cover
very slow outside off, Najibullah steers to point this time
blocked out yet again to end another tight over
fullish outside off, driven to deep cover for a run
full outside off, fourth-stump line, blocked from the crease. Not much feet movement
crunched away but just a run. Shortish and wide outside off
full outside off, pushed towards cover for a run, some miscommunication again but all's good.
wow. That is a massive swing but no connection. Full outside off, Zadran goes for a big hit but the ball sneaks through
slower delivery outside off, an offcutter maybe. Rolls off the outside edge to third man for a run
slower on middle, pushed defensively to midwicket
nice change in pace, tosses it up and wide outside off. the ball grips and spins past the outside edge
shortish and wide, a flayed cut goes to the sweeper
slower on middle and leg, tickled to short fine leg
well bowled again, tosses it up, pitches and spins past the outside edge. Some spin there
slower outside off, patted away towards extra cover for a run
tossed up on middle, he gets forward and smothers the spin
flatter one on middle and leg, tucked towards short fine leg
spins back into middle and leg, Sikandar Raza's misfield at midwicket allows the second run. He dived a little too early as the ball slipped through
wrong-un this time, picked early, played back to the bowler
gets forward and uses his pad as the first line of defense
nicely flighted, lands it on off, he gets forward and taps it to the off side. Another tight over. The pressure is building
slides one across from round the stumps, he looks to ease it behind square on the off side, beaten
spins one down leg, sharp turn but an easy call for the umpire
gives it air, lands it outside off, his eyes light up, looks to slap that over cover but doesn't get the elevation and Elton Chigumbura accepts it gleefully. The slide continues
nicely tossed up outside off, Shenwari's eyes light up, he looks to slap that over cover but doesn't get the elevation, and Chigumbura accepts the catch gleefully. The slide continues
spins back in from outside off, left alone
tucked to the on side
hint of turn onto middle and leg, deflects off the pad to the leg side
pushed into the off side
slowed up on middle, quelled to midwicket

what happened there? Two fielders watch it go past the boundary, tossed up on midlde, Najib goes for the expansive slog and connects well, goes deep towards long-on and clears the boundary, some miscommunication from the fielders this time
shorton leg, its up for Najib to pummel to deep midwicket
googly on middle and off, inside edged to fine leg
slow delivery on middle, not much turn, worked to midwicket with the turn
tossed up but quick through the air on off, pushed to cover
slow on off, nice flight. Blocked
short now, dragged his length back but MA drives with the spin to long-off
beautifully bowled, sees Najib advancing and drags it very short down leg, the ball spins too much, the keeper collects and under-arms but misses the stumps. Good cricket
worked with the spin to deep square leg
tossed up on middle, MA lunges forward and drives to the bowler
flighted outside off, lobs up off the forward defense from Najib
drops slightly short on off, gives Najib enough time to rock back and clip to deep square leg
nicely flighted again, some drift on offer. Driven to long-off but Cremer should have done better in his follow-through

gone! The googly this time and Najibullah goes now, very poor delivery, pulls it short down leg but the googly generates some extra bounce and Najibullah goes back to pull but the bounce does for him, climbs sharply and takes the upper half of the bat. The ball spoons up for Ervine at short fine leg. Afghanistan sink deeper.
beaut, slowed up outside off, the ball grips in the pitch and spins easily past the outside edge.
what happened there? The googly again, on off, and extra bounce yet again. The batsman goes for a swipe but misses completely and the ball bounces over the off stump
tossed up outside off, squeezed towards extra cover
slower outside off, a bit of turn but left alone
quicker outside off, flat too. Blocked
tossed up, lots of flight in fact and end sup overpitched, drilled back at the bowler.
slow outside off, left alone
goes wider of the crease and bowls a flighted delivery on middle, met with the full face of Dawlat's bat as he defends
flight on off, good length. Some spin takes the ball towards point

is that out? The keeper seems confident. Tossed up outside off, Cremer gets a lot of spin and drift, the ball deviates past the outside edge. Mirwais' foot is left outside, he doesn't bother dragging that foot back in and the keeper whips off the bails as he sees the foot outside the crease on the second attempt. Great bit of bowling but not very clever batting.
defended off the front foot
some more flight outside off, pushed with the spin to point
lots of air on leg, pushed to cover
and again, gives the ball lots of flight and lands it well. Defended from the front foot
slower delivery outside off, nice and full. Defended
beauty, quick and flat on middle but gets some spin, a thick outside edge goes on the bounce to slip
faster again outside off, but he is extracting some turn even with that pace, a leading edge lobs up towards point
flatter outside off, sliding on with the arm. Beaten
very slow through the air outside off, pushed to extra cover
slow again outside off, very short. A tentative poke and a thick inside edge ensues, hits the keeper
flat on middle, not much turn, blocked

big swipe against the turn and another wicket. Slowed up on off, with lots of flight. Zadran's eyes lit up, saw an opportunity for some runs and went for an ugly hoick. A thick outside edge is easily snaffled up by Ervine at slip. Afghanistan are left reeling.
tossed up on off, blocked solidly
flight on middle and defended
lots of air on that one, on middle and defended
googly on off, defended
another swipe. Slowed up on middle with a hint of flight, the batsmen comes down and swings to deep midwicket
flat and quick outside off, chopped towards point
tossed up on middle, defended
very slow outside off but the batsman is content to push to cover
tries the quick yorker, gets bat down just in time and digs it out to cover
faster delivery outside off, chopped to point
floated up outside off, played to point

dropped. Cremer does not quite his five-for yet, tossed up outside off, the batsmen goes for the big slog but the ball skews off the outside half, Chigs backtracks but cannot hold onto  a tough chance
tossed up outside off, beats the outside edge

gone this time! taken at long-on, Jongwe. Cremer does get his five for. Nicely slowed up outside off, the batsmen goes for a swipe over long-on and connects nicely too, but does not quite get the desired elevation and was not helped by the fact that he was hitting against the turn. A good catch at the boundary

inn2.comm: drifter to start, a thick inside edge saves Moor. Played fro some spin but won't spin much with a new ball.

bowled im. Poor shot selection. Flatter delivery from Hamza, drifts on with the arm and skids on but Chibhabha goes back and tries to cut a quick delivery, the ball hurries in and takes the pad and then clatters into off stump. Not a great shot at all, and Afghanistan sniff an opportunity.
flat from around the wicket, blocked off the front foot. No turn.
very quick again on off, easily defended off the back foot
tossed up and too full, easily smothered
very quick and full on leg, Ervine presses forward to defend under his eyes
nice swing, fullish outside off. Away shape and Moor puts in a half foot forward to push to mid-off.
full and wide outside off, getting some good angle. Left alone
back of a length delivery on off, Moor slices to point
good delivery from Zadran. Fullish outside off, fourth-stump line. Pushed tentatively to cover
good length on off. nice lines and lengths. Turned towards mid-on
hurries Moor there, good delivery. Good length on off, Moor plays back but the ball hustles on, Moor awkwardly keeps it out

flat on off, Ervine plays inside the line but the ball skids on and takes the outside edge, falls just short of slip and goes through. Pulled back just inside the third man boundary, but his foot was touching the ball and boundary at the same time.
nicely played, flat on middle, worked to deep midwicket
fullish on middle, skiddy delivery and defended
very flat and quick, no flat. Moor goes back to punch to the bowler
not a greats hot again, flat on leg, Moor goes deep in his crease to try and crash a  ball through midwicket but the ball skids on and takes a thick inside edge towards short fine leg who fumbles
fuller this time outside off, driven back
back of a length on middle, played with the angle to midwicket
back of a length on off, clipped to mid-on
hits that back of a length again, outside off and Ervine gets behind the line to push to cover
drifts on a tad too straight and Ervine whips off his pads towards midwicket for a couple.
good length outside off, some movement helps take the ball past the outside edge.
back of a length on middle, hustles Moor for pace who keeps it out
flat but down leg, Ervine helps it on its way to square leg
strays in line, down leg again, turned to short fine leg
darted in on middle, keeps a tad low but Ervine goes back and defends
slower on middle, Ervine blocks off the front foot
nudged off his pads to short midwicket
slowish again on middle and leg, tickled to that midwicket fielder again
back of a length on middle, Moor goes back to quell to cover
lovely shot, stand stall and punches a back of a length delivery past extra cover for a couple. Better timing.
hits that hard length on middle, played out defensively
good length on off, keeps very low. Moor does well to keep it out despite being deep in the crease
full and wide, the shot as there to be played but couldn't connect. Moor flays at it from the crease, not much feet movement. Beaten!
good length outside off, guided to point
good length on middle, not too pacey, pushed to midwicket.

Ervine goes! The pressure of dot balls has yielded another wicket. Ervine skips down and looks to swipe over midwicket but the ball takes a top edge and flies down to third man who takes an easy catch. Iffy strategy from the batsmen so far.
short and wide, really good fielding from extra cover. Moor flays a cut but Samiullah dives full length and prevents the ball from going through
beauty. Good length on off, swerves away late and Mutumbami plays inside the line and is beaten.

bowled im, another one goes. Another wicket for Afghanistan and they are roaring back into the game here. Mutumbami plays from the crease and the ball ducks back in late and sneaks through a big gap between bat and pad before clattering into the stumps. Zimbabwe have lost three now
fullish length on off and Chigs meet with a solid forward block
full delivery on the pads, turned away towards midwicket
huge appeal but not given. Full down leg, may have tickled the trouser on the way to the keeper. Good decision.
good shot. Back of a length outside off, steered to third man
short and wide, Chigumbura pokes at it but is beaten. Very tentative stroke.
full and wide, a nice drive was there to be played. Chigs goes after it from the crease, no feet movement. Beaten!
fullish on off, defended from the crease
poked at from the crease yet again, indecisive feet movement. Fullish outside off
that is better. Full outside off, Moor lunges forward and drives to extra cover
drifts down leg, a wide called
overpitched outside off, Moor pats back to the bowler
full again outside off, a good press forward to defend
another expansive stroke. full outside off, Moor goes for an exuberant stroke down the ground but gets a thick outside edge which flies to third man
that is a good run, full on middle, pushed to mid-on with soft hands and calls for a run immediately.
shortish ;length outside off, Chigs goes after it from the crease again, the ball goes past the outside edge
lovely shot. Overly full outside off, Chigs leans on the drive and times it past the bowler for four. Offered the full face of the bat as well
back of a length on off, Chigs watchfully defends to cover
full but close to off stump, played well into the off side
bangs it in short outside off, Chigs sways out of the line. Nice change in length that.
beautiful. Shaped that one back in but too full, Chigumbura on-drives comfortably past mid-on for another boundary. Lovely batting.
full but strays on leg, a thick inside edge hurries past square leg for a couple.
pushes this one full again on middle, driven with the angle to mid-on
back of a length on off, Moor gets behind the line to defend
full outside off, a good press forward from Moor to block
ooh, misfield allows them the run. good length outside off, punched towards extra cover who lets the ball go through
a thick outside edge again, but well past the wide slip fielder. Good length outside off, Chigs walks at the bowler and gets an edge
flat delivery to start but a good run from Chigs, pushes to extra cover and calls immediately
nicely tossed up on off, not much turn, driven with the turn to cover
overpitched outside off, carved past point for one
lovely delivery, wrapped his hand around the ball but delivered a legspinner, beats the poke of Chigumbura
drifts down leg now, wide called
tossed up on off, Chigs comes forward to block
pushed through flat and quick, Chigs slaps back to the bowler
a tad too full on off but Moor can only drive to mid-off
full outside off, punch-driven to extra cover. Good field, not allowing an easy run there
full on middle, blocked to mid-on with the angle
pierces the gap through point for a couple. Full again but a touch too wide allowing Moor to drive freely
full on off, properly defended off the front foot
too full again but Moor finds mid-off with a tame drive
good batting from chigs, skips down the track,gets to the pitch of the flighted delivery and drives against the turn to long-on
good-looking shot, shortish on leg, Moor whips this towards deep midwicket and was looking for two immediately, easily get it. Better stuff from Moor
short outside off, punched off the back foot to long-off
tossed up on off, driven to cover
the slider outside off, skids on with the arm. beaten on the inside edge
shot delivery down leg, Chigs misses an opportunity as he is struck on the thigh pad after a missed pull. He isn't happy with that shot.
back of a length on off, nicely turned to deep square leg. Good intent from Moor.
really clever batting from Chigs, steps down to throw Ashraf's length off, but drills a drive to mid-off and scampers a run
shortish and wide, cut into the ground to extra cover
strays down leg, flicked down to fine leg
good length outside off, Chigs stays on the back foot and punches a drive to cover
back of a length on off, a squirted drive hurries to mid-on
short and wide, sits up for Moor to crash through extra cover for one
floated up on off, dabbed to point
poor delivery, feigns an advance down the track, SS fires one down leg and he helps it on its way past short fine leg, good batting
tossed up again outside off, crunchy drive to cover
overpitched on off, nicely driven with the turn to mid-off
beautiful stroke from Moor, slicing a full delivery past point
nicely tossed up on off, Moor lunges forward and defends, hard hands from Moor.

beauty! Tossed up on middle and leg, the ball rips past the outside edge of Moor and clatters into off stump. Not much Moor could have done about that, a beautiful delivery, the right pace and flight.
lovely bowling, flighted outside off. Raza runs at the bowler but drives past silly point
flatter on off, pushed to cover
nice bowling, flight outside off, Raza is flirting. A thick outside edge to third man earns Raza one
some more flight outside off, Chigs shimmies down and inside-halves to midwicket
dragged down short outside off, patted softly to cover
Shenwari oversteps, not good from him. Full delivery and driven to long-on for a run
a massive hoick and comprehensively beaten, nice flight outside off
slower on leg, rips to off and Raza guides to point
shortish and wide, punched to extra cover
tried to hit that too hard did Chigumbura, tossed up on off. He came down and whacked a drive to cover
better, gets to the pitch of the flight and times a drive to long-off
shortish outside off, Chigumbura stays back and pushes a hard drive to long-off
too full on off, quick through the air but blocked by Raza
good batting, raced down to the pitch and chipped a drive to long-off
lucky. Flatter on middle, this one doesn't turn but EC plays for some, a thick inside edge just evades leg stump
flat on middle, pushed to long-on
short but too wide, Raza watches it go by to the keeper
half-volley again, Chigumbura tries to hit the cover off the ball, squeezes it to point
fullish outside off, nicely carved to deep cover
slower on leg, a thick outside edge scurries towards third man, they get through for a run after some contemplation
too short, and quick on leg, whipped to deep midwicket
flatter on middle and leg, Raza goes back and gets his bat down just in time.
very poor delivery, rank long-hop down leg, strikes Raza on the pad after he misses his pull
some flight on middle, Chigumbura walks to the pitch and clips to long-on
plays away from his bat, tossed up outside off, raza drives but not in control at all
good stop, flat and quick on off, pushed back at the bowler who makes a good diving stop
shortish outside off, chopped to third man
slower through the air outside off, played down into the ground towards third man again
flat on middle, driven to long-on
slower delivery on off, not much flight. On off and blocked
drops it a touch short outside off, punch-driven to cover
tossed up now on off, caressed to cover
much slower on middle, Raza runs at the bowler and drives to long-on
tossed up on off, Chigs runs at the ball and clips to midwicket

Big, big wicket this. Tosses it up on middle, Chigumbura goes to whip to the leg side but misses completely. The ball sneaks through and hits the stumps. Nabi is ecstatic. The big wicket for Afghanistan there, the bowling change has worked.
good start, fullish outside off, Raza leaves watchfully
full delivery shaping away from the batsman who shoulders arms
lovely delivery, full on off and middle, swings away late. Raza awkwardly keeps it out

gone. Raza has to go. A big wicket for Afghanistan, a total breakdown in communication. Raza drives towards mid-off with decent power and calls for a run immediately but Waller does't respond. Despite a fumble, the throw back is decent to the keeper and Zim lose another.
fullish on middle and leg, turned to mid-on
full and swinging away, nice delivery. Jongwe drives with leaden-feet an dis beaten
big turn from outside off, immediate appeal as he kisses the pad and dribbles to fine leg. Would have easily missed leg.
blocks a good length ball that fizzes into him from outside off
tossed up on off stump, defended to the man under the lid
drags him forward and makes him block a lovely offspiner outside off

ripper at short leg! Afghanistan are taking this home in style! Noor Ali, take a bow! Waller has been pressing forward to block, so Nabi held the ball back just enough that it would hit the pitch, kick off it and take the inside edge. The ball went low, but straight at the short leg fielder and Noor Ali dived forward to complete a lovely catch
gets down the track and whips it past Noor Ali's right at short leg
some shape away from the right-hander, who pokes and misses. Hands on heads time for Afghanistan.
goes for the expansive drive once he sees the wide half-volley, but the man at point dives to his right and saves some valuable runs.
checks his drive to cover, but that off side ring looks impenetrable
back of a length and outside off, Cremer pushes at it and gets an outside edge to deep third man
good length ball on middle and off, Jongwe keeps it out
opens the face to adjust to the outswing and guides the good length ball down to deep third man
a touch too straight and Jongwe is able to push it down to long-on. He won Zimbabwe a thriller in Bangladesh not long ago. Could he do it again?

uncertainty in the running again, but this time there is no casualty. Cremer had come down the track and got a leading edge as he sought to pick a flatter ball through midwicket. It went past the silly point, but was cut short at point
eased off the open face to point. No runs
flighted on middle and off, kept out
fired in, Cremer takes advantage of it by backing away and slashing it through the covers. Good, sharp footwork
gets down the track and works the ball through midwicket
nudged behind square leg to pick up a single
inside edge! But it evades the stumps. It was barely short, but Jongwe thought he could just dab it to third man. Poor shot selection, especially with no feet
fires in the yorker at the base of off stump, Cremer digs it out
full and wide, Cremer picks out point and then admonishes himself. Hit the toe end of the bat there
beautiful awayswinger! Hit a lovely length - not overpitched, but not short - so when the batsman comes forward he can't quite negate the movement. Beaten soundly
back of a length and outside off, pushed to cover
ooh, nicely bowled, tossed up outside off, drawing Jongwe forward, the ball spins to take the inside-half towards square leg
slow outside off, too much time for Cremer to block
good variation, bowled it quicker and faster towards off stump. No turn and defended
punched back to the bowler
floated up on middle and leg, blocked
runs! Important runs! Nabi drops one short and on leg too. Cremer goes back quickly and pummels a pull to backward square leg

wow, beauty. Hamza does it again, goes wider of the crease and pitches on middle, that angle created made Jongwe defend down the line, but the ball spun and gripped in the wicket to take the off stump. Stunning delivery, and what a timely one at that. Zim now eight down, with lots of work to do.
premeditated sweep. Slower offspinner outside off, the batsman goes across and tries to sweep but the ball is pulled back, an awkward paddle ensues
slower outside off, driven to cover
quicker but straight, Wellington gets some bat on his block
pushed wider of the crease, the ball spins a mile but Wellington follows the ball and turns to square leg
big appeal, not given! Good decision, slid on with the arm and beat the outside edge outside off
slower on middle and leg, worked away towards backward square leg
gone! Zim nine down. Wellington goes for the sweep but the ball bounces a touch and takes the top edge. Spoons up for short fine leg to take. Zimbabwe have capitulated here.
flatter outside off, off the outside half towards short third man for one
a touch too short on leg, clipped to deep square leg
tossed up down leg, may have clipped the pad on the way to the keeper. Shahzad goes up immediately but rightly not given.
Cremer goes for the run, slower outside off, played towards short third man where a run is completed
flighted on off, TM goes to the pitch to block
slowed up and wide outside off, TM guides one down on the bounce to first slip
full and flat on off, dug out
fired full and quick on leg, TM shuffles across and miss his flick, very very close to leg stump there.

gone! He has been given. Afghanistan win. What a performance from the bowlers. A slider on middle and leg, the ball skids on and hits TM on the pad in front of leg, the umpire had no hesitation and delirious scenes as Afghanistan go 1-0 up. Stumps are uprooted and fists are pumped, Zimbabwe are distraught.
